reviews.text: I really liked the hotel.. the Rooms were well maintained... The people working there were very friendly. And the place is very connected.. Its truly value for the money you pay for your stay.. I will stay in this hotel the next time I am visiting Goa.
reviews.title: Value For Money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: best option for vegies in Goa, very friendly staff at reception & at bar. Special cheers 2 Ms.Samiksha for her perfect guidance for sightseeing in Goa & Mr. Satya who always made us smile whenever we met him or required anything. The owner Mr. Dev was friendly to. rooms were clean and rate charged to us was also very friendly & supportive.
reviews.title: Best Hotel to stay in North Goa

reviews.text: Clean rooms, Smiley faces, Excellent service. We stayed for 3 nights and we felt it very short. My toddler loved the place, the swimming pool, Snowy(the cat).
reviews.title: Family and kid friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food was excellent. We sticked with regular menu. Complimentary breakfast was awesome.
reviews.title: Definitely felt like a King in a Castle

reviews.text: Dev the owner of the property stays in the same hotel with his wife and daughter. His only focus is to keep the guesta happy and make sure they have a pleasent stay. You would see him hanging at the Bar in the evenings and keep the guests entertained and collect their Feedback.
reviews.title: Clean, big rooms. Excellent service. Good restaurant.

reviews.text: Castle House is about 10 minutes walk from the beach, the rooms are clean and have a TV and a fridge. Pool is small but adequate however the water is a little cloudy and we did have to ask them to clean it out a few times. There are only six sunloungers around the pool and they could do with being updated but they give you towels to lie on.
reviews.title: Nice rooms in a good location...

reviews.text: You're about a 30 minute walk to Baga Beach which is so much nicer than Calangute Beach so you should make the effort to head there.
reviews.title: Comfortable stay

reviews.text: Breakfast is ok. One thing that did let the place down was the fact that they charge their guests to use the Internet on their own computer which sits on the bar and they do not have wifi available so that you can use your own device.
reviews.title: its ok .. but not value for money

reviews.text: Castle House Hummmmm, i will remember you guys........ Mr. Dev will definitely come back next year.
reviews.title: perfect stay

reviews.text: Hey guys this is the place if you are looking budget stay, close to the beach,Good food and friendly Staff,
reviews.title: Excellent Everything! A great stay!

reviews.text: I visited this hotel in April with my family and must say we all had an excellent holiday at this place.
reviews.title: best holiday ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is great, only 15 mins walk to the beach and 5 to 10 mins to local amenities, the rooms are very good and the service is excellent, Staff is extremely friendly and it felt like home away from home.
reviews.title: Good but over-priced

reviews.text: i would recommend this hotel to friends and family and will defiantly stay here again if i go to goa
reviews.title: No way, not at all.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is about 15 minutes walk from most busy Calangute beach. While hotel and room was good with all the basic facilities, I think price was bit higher. We booked a double room by makemytrip in 1894/- per day (B/F included). Otherwise, room was spacious, with AC, mini-refrigerator, balcony, Almira, cloth drying stand etc. They also have restaurant and bar, though again a bit costly I think....My guess is that cost is due to because it is near to most famous beach of goa.
reviews.title: Right place at the right price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is better looking outside but not good at all from inside. Food ordered takes hours to delivered, breakfast is not buffet but just some pieces of bread and eggs. And the biggest problem is you have to beg for your inclusive breakfast. Staff here are traitors to India, they provide good services to foreigners but for Indian vistors they are rude and uncooperative. Fan not working, AC doesn't have remote. I'll not suggest this place to any one.
reviews.title: Comfortable and Value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At first Castle House was hard to find, as it's down an unnamed road, off of the main road to Calangute Beach. The room was not what I expected and was fairly grubby, but after a long flight from London and abnormal amounts of harassment outside of the airport... all that was needed was a place to rest our heads.
reviews.title: Adequate Lodging.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is situated in a good area, it's pretty quiet (apart from the packs of dogs howling outside in the night) and it's close to Calangute beach, an internet cafe, the bus stop as well as the shops, restaurants and bars.
reviews.title: Good for Youngsters, but not for couples

reviews.text: The staff are excellent and were so friendly, so it made up for the grubby room (bed clothes had satins, as did the walls and doors).
reviews.title: Best place to stay in Calangute!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Halfway through our stay we noticed that the room began to smell very strongly of mould, and upon inspecting the walls, pillars and ceilings in our room, we noticed that there was in fact a lot of mould that had just painted over. The staff were informed and changed our room for us, which turned out to be much better!
reviews.title: Awesome Holidays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is simple, but included and the rate per room was cheap! There is a poolside bar and the drinks are very cheap!
reviews.title: fab budget hotel
